website_summaries.verdict: Provides consistent relief for pressure points from day one, especially around the hips and lower back, so users get quality sleep.
pros: Isolates motion very well between two sleepers so that movement doesn’t cause discomfort to a partner
Hybrid construction offers good innerspring support beneath plush memory foam top layers, helping to align the spine properly and reduce hip pain
cons: May be too firm for side sleepers and tends to sleep warm

customer_reviews.title: I doubt no longer
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a couple for our young boys, didn't want to spend a lot but didn't want junk either. They sleep like the dead now on their new mattresses. I snuck in a nights sleep while they were at a friends overnite and I slept like the dead too. So...we ordered another one. Now, I am ordering another because my wife slept on it and was wow'ed as well. We ordered a med firm which is soft and conforming on the pillow top but the firmness keeps you from sinking in. If it sags in the future I will update but for now we ALL are perfectly happy with these mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Firm, but soft is a lie
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on this bed for a month now. When I laid down on it for the first time, I realized that the reviews that said it wasn’t too firm and that it was fairly soft were lies. It’s so firm that I spent $400 on a Serra memory foam mattress topper to try to help and it’s still not great. If I could easily return this, I would in a heartbeat. I thought maybe the firm, yet soft reviews and the reviews about easing back pain were convincing enough to try it, but I regret it. You get what you pay for and I have definitely learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock.. no give at all.  A camping pad would feel better than this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Too hard. As a friggin' rock. Can't return, costs as much to ship it back as the refund would be
customer_reviews.author: Micah Kiter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Do not hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this matress. It came quickly, nicley packed and clean. I was able to move it into my daughters room alone and unpack it easily. There was NO ODOR. I was mostly worried about smells because it was for my daughters room it had no noticeable odor unlike any clothing item you may order online. It took about 4 days to fully "inflate". It's very soft but firm at the same time. Only time will tell how it will hold up but it looks like a great buy so far. The first pick is 1 hour after opening and second was 4/5 days later. It's the full 10 inches as described. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: dri2007

customer_reviews.title: Amazing really!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We have only just received the mattress and as it is it’s extremely impressive. It’s soooo comfortable. I mean sooooo comfortable. We own a more expensive bed from one of the online retailers. We love ours so we wanted to buy one with similar stats for our child. This fit the bill and it’s just as comfortable! It expanded relatively quickly with basically no smell whatsoever. It was packaged very well and everything was clean. Only time will tell how it wears. I will return for an updated review if things change, but for now I’m extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased a mattress online, so I did so with trepidation. I have been sleeping on this mattress now for 2 weeks and I have to say it is the most comfortable mattress I have ever slept on. No more waking during the night, no more back pain. I highly recommend this mattress and could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: karen j. dame

customer_reviews.title: Got my money’s worth
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and laying in bed can be painful. This mattress cradles my every muscle and makes it much more comfort to sleep. Well worth the money. I am hoping it holds up and does not get dents and sags over time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone, avoid if you have back problems
customer_reviews.text: Not for everyone, avoid if you have back problems, I tossed my 2 yr old airloom mattress and box spring believing in having something lighter to Florida’s climate, the reviews were excellent but I received a mattress that was nicely packaged until we found bugs on layer of plastic attached to the mattress, besides that it is uncomfortable, my husband doesn’t have back issues and hates it, we both wake up as if we hadn’t slept and I can barely walk since I had spinal fusion and have other 2 herniated disks. You can feel the horrible cheap springs plus we had to hurry and buy encasement once we opened this mattress. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: @Bella

customer_reviews.title: Worst Mattress Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so uncomfortable. Wake up every morning with back pain and crinks in my neck. Worst sleep ever. Absolutely too firm. I feel like I’m sleeping on rocks. Thought that because it was a hybrid I’d get the feel of memory foam but there’s no memory foam feel at all. If that’s what you’re looking for don’t waste your money. This mattress is worst than the 16 year old mattress I threw out. Every second I regret buying it. Thought I’d give it time and it would soften up but big mistake. Now I have to get a memory foam topper to be comfortable in my own bed. DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY UNLESS YOU LIKE SLEEPING ON ROCK HARD SURFACES!!?
customer_reviews.author: S. Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised! Nice and firm!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this bed and it's been a month. He weighs 280lb and I'm 180lb. It has been decent when I sleep alone but it has a little give when hubby comes to bed (plus he snores!). It has helped my overall sleep. I would say it has improved my back pain significantly. I am a side sleeper. We really didn't want to buy online but we are happy with our decision. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with a sore back for a long time. My new mattress was too soft. After having done some research for something firmer, I decided to try this BedStory. It is fabulous. I've only slept on it for one night and my back is less sore already. If you need something firm with a soft top, this is a great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Twug

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallow fluff
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfy mattress! Kinda like sleeping on a giant marshmallow. Really heavy for one person and hard to unpackage, but it fluffed up quickly and we were able to sleep on it the first night. I am thrilled with the new bed.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I bought a bed in the mail
customer_reviews.text: Yes- I had no idea that this was a thing. A bed in a box. When I started looking for matresses for my toddler son, this seemed to be THE thing and I hate going shopping so a bed in a box it is. Surprisingly, this bed is great. Easy to set up, soft, comfy, looks good. Main issues are rounded edges where I tend to sit on to read him books overnight. The edges are curved from the weight. Fantastic price. Super comfy I must say. No need to deal with pushy furniture sales folk or schlepping- this came in a box and turned into a bed. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ramos

customer_reviews.title: It sinks
customer_reviews.text: I got some pain relief in my hip but it's not as soft as I expected. Also, mine sinks in the middle. It looks like I've had it for years while it's only been a few months.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Wow nice
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review after sleeping on it for awhile. I love it! It’s firm and not a cloud like some say but very comfortable! We had been sleeping on a sleep number bed for 10 years and got sick of the division down the middle of the bed so we wanted a new mattress. This is thick and when one gets in or out you really don’t know. The quality it outstanding. I’m planning on buying one for a guest bed ....
customer_reviews.author: Karl Schneider

customer_reviews.title: The most painful sleeps ever
customer_reviews.text: Well, if it weren’t for Amazon making things right for me, this mattress would have gotten one star all the way around. I have slept on less than good mattresses before. I have slept on very firm latex mattresses. This mattress is THE WORST thing I’ve ever slept on. I labored over the decision to buy this mattress. I wanted something with latex in it that was affordable. I chose this one due to the good reviews. Wow. I don’t know if they got a different bed than I did? I have a chronic illness, and this bed is HORRIBLE for my health. If you’re considering this mattress... my suggestion is to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I used youtube to decide on which mattress to purchase. The Sleep Sherpa is excellent! We wanted something in the middle when it comes to firm and soft. This is perfect! We love this mattress. Have been sleeping on it for a month now. The only thing I don't like is that there is a tag on the top side of the mattress that is sewn into the mattress and it crinkles when my foot touches it at night. That's literally the only reason I gave it a four star, because why would they put it there??
customer_reviews.author: grease_1978

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in the full XL and liked it. So I bought one for myself- my old mattress was sunk in the middle and too soft. I was worried I would take a long time to adjust to one much firmer, but I had no issues! Slept perfectly. For me the right amount of softness and yet firm! Perfect- easy to get, let it sit for 3 days first! And great price! Not too mention no stores have been open for months here! It was perfect! My so. Still loves his since feb right before the world seem to collapse in regards to going in person to stores!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for sleep lovers
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed!! My favorite activity is sleep and my old bed just wasn’t cutting the mustard. I had been looking at these style beds in a box for quite a while as I compulsively it window shop on amazon 🤪 most top brands had mixed reviews and I was skeptical 🤨 but decided to give Bedstory a try and oh boy am I glad I did! My husband and I opened it up this afternoon and within an hour it seemed to be expanded. I measured it and it was 9” I’m sure the foam on top will plump up as it breathes a bit. I’m really impressed with this mattress! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: A Grateful Night’s Rest
customer_reviews.text: There is something worrisome about receiving a mattress sealed in a vacuum bag. My concerns were that the mattress would not be shaped properly as a reslut of such packaging. Good news though, my fears were unfounded. I waited 36 of the 48-72 recommended hours to allow the mattress time to reach it’s 10’ height. After giving the mattress a good “shake” the second day, it reached its maximum and I slept incredibly well the night of the 2nd evening. The construction feels well-built and memory foam topping the mattress is of a denser material that most I’ve slept on, so I’m thinking that is going to translate to longevity. I have no complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this mattress. I never knew how bad my old mattress was until I slept on this. Very easy to unbox no weird smell and it was ready to use in about 24 hours ( it turned the ac off in the room to help it out ). This is my 4th night sleeping on it and it just keeps getting better it is so nice not waking up stiff and sore.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Crazy fast shipping i ended up buying 3 queen size beds the kids love them
customer_reviews.author: ronny ponte

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat firm but comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I usually prefer a softer mattress. This is a fairly firm mattress but I found I sleep well on this mattress and I don't wake up stiff and sore in the mornings. I really like it and I would buy another. It is appears to be a quality made mattress.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleD

customer_reviews.title: 7 inches after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Waited 4 days for 10 inches b4 I slept on it. Now a week and it's 7 inches. Seems like the ring of springs around the whole bed did not open all the way. Going to give it another week and if it's not 10 inches I got a dud and want another bed. Too many 5 star reviews to get a bed like this. 30 trial will be used if it doesn't open to 10 inches. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Cooper. Honest reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed that is super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a bed on Amazon. My previous bed and box spring was a Sealy that I really liked. The set up for the new bed was easy although it is heavy. It did have a slight odor that dissipated after 24 hours. At full inflation the bed is 9 and 1/2 inches. The bed is surprisingly so comfortable. It is on the firm side. I love my new bed. Try it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The dark side goes on the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these mattresses to replace our daughters' twin size. They arrived on time. I didn't notice any kind of chemical smell like I had read on reviews of vacuum sealed mattresses. Our girls are enjoying them. One of them is the full 10". The other is only at 9" Tonight the full 72 hours is up for it to return to it's full shape. So I'll give it until then. Overall we are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: The shipping box was pretty torn up
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice and comfortable we might order another one for our guest room.
customer_reviews.author: C Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Showed up in a box that I just new couldn't hold a queen mattress in. Well, to my surprise, yup, that box holds a queen mattress. I will be honest, I got two of these mattresses for the guest room and our 14 year olds room. The price was very reasonable (almost too much so) but I said what the hell, let's go for it. The mattresses are wonderful. Now the husband wants a king for our bedroom. Next month I think. You will be very pleased with the purchase. We are. So is the 14 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Soellner

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Firm, but not hard. I live it and look forward to sleeping. I have never had back pain, but about a year ago i had issues that lasted for over a year. With this purchase, i AM< back pain free, legit and not paid to say as such, for a few months now. The price i paid and the sleep I enjoy everyday is probably worth 10x more then the price of this mattress. I am more then happy. Best mattress i have ever owned and at 1/2 the price if big box big name retailers
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mattress !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress after reading the great reviews and after sleeping on it for a bit - I agree. I was skeptical that I could get a quality mattress for such a low price but I was pleasantly surprised. The set-up was easy and it was amazing to watch it inflate and become such a firm mattress. I could not be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: G.C.Warren

customer_reviews.title: 10 inch only 8 inches
customer_reviews.text: Bought the queen size mattress several weeks ago. Very comfortable so far. Only negative is the 10 inch mattress only inflated to 8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but comfortable (Please pay attention with manufacturing material based on your preference)
customer_reviews.text: Considering the importance of good sleep, I have tried very hard to go through tons of reviews to find out this mattress. I do notice there are some low-rating comments complaining 'hard(not soft enough)'. But after doing some research, I realize it was actually caused by the manufacturing material. Latex-made mattress is indeed 'hard' than Gel-made mattress, but it recovers much quicker!!! I do not actually get used with 'too soft' mattress, thus I chosen the Latex-made one. Three weeks past, I am feeling quite happy with the decision I have made. It is super comfortable to me!!! I
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's bunk bed, and it came rolled up in a box. I had my doubts about how good the mattress would be, since it was so inexpensive, but I can say I am thoroughly impressed. I had to allow a day for the mattress to fully decompress, but it is really comfortable, even for a guy my size. For now, my 7 year old loves his bed, and is sleeping comfortably all night with no complaints. So, I am very happy with the comfort for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son's new bed. Arrived quickly in perfect condition. Easy enough to get to the room and set up. It did expand to nearly full size within minutes, but the corners took a bit longer. We gave it a couple days before trying it out. *Couldn't ask for a better value and feel. *Firm support with plush top feel. *Doesn't have any chemical or foam smell *Absolutely no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bed for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my daughter and we are sooo impressed with it. I did tons of research and some of the cheaper mattresses from other companies had bedbugs or mold. I wasn’t willing to take the chance. Straight out of the box this one was clean, comfortable, and easy to put in place. We bought the full size mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This memory foam spring hybrid is very comfortable. Rating it a medium/firm. Pressure points felt evenly distributed. We purchased this one for our new Murphy bed. It doesn't feel overly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: NicoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good fine for guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is comfortable. Although it feels like you’re going to roll off the edge. We ordered a 10 inch mattress and received an 8 inch. Bed Story sent us a 2 inch memory foam topper but now it makes bed too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Faber

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: ONE OF THE BEST THINGS I HAVE DONE!! I'M 6 MONTHS PREGNANT THE MATTRESS THAT I HAD BEFORE WAS KILLING MY LOWER BACK TO THE POINT THAT I WOULD GO SLEEP IN THE LIVING ROOM BUT LAST NIGHT I SLEPT LIKE A BABY..!! SOMETHING I HAVEN'T DONE IN A LONG LONG TIME..! SUPER HAPPY WITH MY MATTRESS. OVER ALL I REALLY GIVE YOU GUYS 5 STARS!! THANK YOU SO MUCH!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Blanca M.

customer_reviews.title: I pick the right mattress for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed a month ago I wanted to be sure before I write a honest review. When the bed arrived it had alil smell to it nothing bad. The bed is big nice and firm since I switch out my old mattress nomore body aches. I didn’t want to spend a lot on a mattress but for the price and quality this bed was definitely worth it I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Immaculee gedine

customer_reviews.title: Not what we paid for...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was quite comfortable, BUT, it never surpassed 10", even though we left it to "inflate" for a week. It started showing indents where we slept after only 2 weeks, and I think it may have been partly due to it never reaching its full thickness. We returned, and bought a different brand that was full size (14.5") within hours.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Never took shape
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the mattress but I t’s been over a month and the head and the foot of the bed never inflated all the way. It curves down significantly on either end.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Does not expand properly
customer_reviews.text: After 7+ days, the bed has fully expanded in the middle but not on either end. So far, it appears that we will have 10” in the middle, but closer to 8” on the head and foot of the mattress. I need an extra pillow to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Parts

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: After days of trying to decide on which mattress to get (latex or memory foam), my boyfriend and I finally decided on this one and it was the best choice! It stays cool throughout the night, it’s not too soft or too hard and it was so quick to set up and use. I am so happy I bought this mattress! My back was hurtin from sleeping in a mattress that was too soft and this fixed it all. I always have a good night sleep since I bought this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Lexington

customer_reviews.title: Would definately purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is way more solidly constructed then I thought it was going to be. It is also bigger and fuller than I had expected. I guess because my expectations were so low over online, mattress in a box, the quality and comfort has blown me away!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The mattress came in a box shrink wrapped. We opened it up and it started to expand. We let it breathe for 12 hours, it was ready to go. So comfy and soft. Good nights sleep so far. Hopefully it will last more than 3 years. We had a sealy mattress that only lasted that long. The Queen Euro pillow top is quilted and plush. Looks luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: mob

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but sort of lumpy
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable. I would give it a five star review however, although i followed the directions when i opened mattress, the mattress still has not fully expended at the top and bottom of the bed. the bed is at least 2 inches deeper in the middle then at either end.
customer_reviews.author: JIll THornton

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for a great mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress totally exceeded my expectations. I bought it for my almost 4 year old but I would sleep on it. It came packaged beautifully and started inflating as soon as it was opened. I was skeptical about ordering a mattress online but there is no quality difference that I can tell from ordering in a store. My daughter is delighted and so am I - great deal for the price. Trust the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: LisaP

customer_reviews.title: A quick solution...
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable the bed is for the money especially the latex blend. But when I opened it, there look like some compression stains from whatever machine they use. And also a top corner of the mattress never fully formed but hey it’s Amazon. It will due for now.
customer_reviews.author: Aiesha

customer_reviews.title: Our Bed Story...They (Selpt) Happily Ever After.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 10" Queen Bed Story Mattress for our guest bedroom. The first night it expanded to about 8.5 inches; by the third night it was up to the full ten inches. Would recommend not planning on sleeping on it until it is fully expanded. Also, I read other reviews about an odor - we didn't have that experience. We are excited to have a comfortable bed for our guests and feel this mattress has been a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by the quality feel of this bed. The stitching is good and the mattress feels high-quality. Just the right firmness for me. I have a bad back. It is comfortable and not flimsy. I have the twin bed and am very disappointed that the full size is no longer available. I wanted to test the twin before ordering the full size for our bunkbeds. I hope the full comes back on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Adaugo

customer_reviews.title: Mattress Body Impression After 6 Months.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it’s not a bad mattress however, after 6 months there is a clear body well from sleeping in the spot. I will flip and rotate in an effort to resolve and update with my results
customer_reviews.author: Scott Eager

customer_reviews.title: Good start
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my first night sleep on my new mattress. I waited 54 hours after opening the packaging. However it only took 10 minutes for the mattress to expand to its full 10 inches which may have something to do with being in Phoenix on a 100 degree day (I think the heated and dry air helped it to decompress faster than normal). My old mattress was about 12 years old and I needed to sleep on a lumbar pillow to avoid back pains. Slept last night without the pillow and experienced no pain and slept solidly. Medium Firm is an apt description for the support. Nervous about ordering a boxed mattress but the price and results paid off handsomely.
customer_reviews.author: BWOracle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, a little firmer than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress about a week ago and already love it. When it came, it was neatly packaged and easy to set up. It only took about five hours for it to be almost fully inflated and ready to sleep on. Sleeping on it was very comfortable and while it was a little harder than expected, but otherwise very good. It doesn’t make any noise when u move and has no smell which is great. I would definitely recommend this for anyone who enjoys a good bed that is a little on the firmer side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy Bed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the twin size bed and it is very comfortable while offering good support. It is also plush on top but firm, similar to a memory foam but without the heat. Such a good bed for an excellent price. I would order this bed again
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not the size as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Got the mattress and unboxed per the instructions and let it sit for 4 days. Supposed to be a 10 x 39 x 80 inch twin xl mattress but only expanded to 8 inches high and is only 78 inches long. Width is correct at 39 inches. Guess it was on sale for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: TreeF15E

customer_reviews.title: It should be more thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom but it is not like the picture I thought it was going to be more thicker . So I bought a supporting mattress’s in order to make It more thickness
customer_reviews.author: Safaa

customer_reviews.title: No more pain!
customer_reviews.text: (After 3 days) Literally 3 minutes later, I was in cloud9, surrounded by Angels lol I didn't wake up at all...and once I did. I felt brand new
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: comfy and perfect support right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a standard worn out mattress for a fully furnished rental apartment. First time purchaser of a 'mattress in a box' and must say, I'm super impressed. Very comfortable with great support. Feels better than my expensive dual chamber adjustable air mattress I'm now sleeping on. I'm considering replacing it with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Piccirilli

customer_reviews.title: Very good bargain mattress, little on the hard side
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for myself (I'm about 6' 200 lb) and after letting the mattress sit after unrolling for about 60 hours (recommended 48-72) it rose to between 9-10 inches (advertised 10). I noticed after sleeping on it for the first time that it is definitely on the harder side as far as mattresses go but not awful and nothing a topper couldn't fix. Overall would recommend the mattress to someone that's maybe on a tight budget but make sure you are okay with a stiffer mattress.
customer_reviews.author: TW.Iglehart

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: After researching beds for days I decided to try a BedStory mattress. We gave it the 48 hour wait before sleeping on it, but it seemed fully extended after 24 hours. Although, the bed is not quiet 10 inches (9-9.5 depending on area) it is very comfy. My husband and I didn't sleep this well on our expensive Serta. I would recommend this bed to anyone who likes a firm mattress and needs a good night rest. I hope this mattress lasts a while. Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Comfortable, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: All of the positive reviews for these mattresses are for good reasons! I ordered 2 of the full size 10 inch mattresses for my teenagers and they absolutely love them! A little on the firm side but not in an uncomfortable way (I am a bit spoiled with my pillow top mattress, so I am used to ultra soft)...it's kinda amazing how high of quality the mattress is for coming rolled up and compressed I would buy from this company again if I ever need another mattress
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hyer

customer_reviews.title: Completely accurate description!
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable price for a high quality mattress. Instructions to unpack easy to follow. More comfortable and supportive for my arthritic back than tempurpedic mattress that I have had for 10 years. Finally, a great night's sleep! Do not think twice about purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Mad
customer_reviews.text: The matress get here today to out the the first pastic but left the second look at the matress and it dirty very dispoint pay to much for that
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mattress for my son who is recovering from a procedure on his back. He went from being only able to sleep on his side to sleeping in any position. We did top it separately with cooling foam topper for extra softness while he heals. The mattress did take several days to expand before we could place it on the bed, so be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: P J W

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this mattress for one of our spare rooms. Once we took it out and let it expand (never expanded to the full 10") was hard to keep everyone off the bed...so comfortable and it didn't hurt our backs...even if it only expanded to 8", was still comfy...
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: After more than 2 weeks this mattress is still flat and lumpy. They offered me a topper to put on it - what they heck is that going to do??? Trying to return this defective item is impossible. They issue you a ups return label but ups will not accept it after it’s been opened. But if you’re into rolling off the bed at night or sleeping on an incline this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wong

customer_reviews.title: Super easy.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that the process was so easy. Just carefully cut the plastic sheeting and let the product expand. Mine is still in the expanding process (day 2) and its looking good. I used the mattress in a guest bedroom but I do plan to try it out myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Holds shape, supportive.
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year the mattress shows no signs of sagging, I am really impressed for the price, and will likely come back to this company if I ever need a new mattress. I was skeptical about the 'boxed mattress' thing, but had no problems with unpacking it, and it filled out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Pillow top could be a little thicker. That said, I will keep the mattress. It's better than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: John Lorang

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bed!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing!! I’m so impressed by it and how comfortable my sleep was. I bought this bed for a vacation rental property. Paired with a steel box spring purchased on Amazon, it was an affordable option for a home that turns over mattress often. Hoping it lasts for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye TP.

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for my son while at college. Sits on boards not box springs. He liked it so much he asked if we could replace his mattress at home.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is my third mattress from amazon and this is another comfortable affordable mattress to be delivered so promptly. Live it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bed for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. The days of spending close to a 1000 dollars for a mattress are over. I was a bit skeptical about ordering a mattress that's rolled up in a box. This is my 3rd night sleeping on it and it is comfy but sturdy. I'm 190lbs and a side sleeper. I woke up with no sores and in a great mood, which is a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my toddler and so far it has been great. There was no smell, as others have mentioned in previous reviews, and it recovered to its normal size quickly after opening. This is a quality mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustym313

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good ... The mattress was packaged well and seemed to expand to full size within a day (although I waited the minimum of 48 hours to sleep on it as recommended). It seems to be a very good quality mattress, especially for the price you pay. It is very firm mattress yet comfortable (if the firmness is an issue for you, you can always add a foam topper as I did). Overall, a very good buy and I hope it will last a long time. I will update this review if anything changes but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy yet firm
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived in good condition and was able to inflate pretty quickly after opening its packaging. I found the bed both firm and comfy. Each person has their preferences and this one fits my needs pretty well. It has been a couple of nights since I got the bed and I have not seen any problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Simple sleep
customer_reviews.text: This mattress had no odor when opened, took two days to fully expand and was easy to manipulate onto the platform bed without a box springs. Why didn't we do this sooner?
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: A rolled up mattress that is very good and opened right up. Easy to bring into the room and easy to place on the bed. I am over 65 and had no trouble getting it on bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and Product
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived earlier than expected and had easy to follow instructions. Bed rose to almost 10 inches I was amazed. Very comfortable and great nights sleep. ( -:
customer_reviews.author: Tommy T

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress, great purchase. I ordered it after a friend recommendation and i'm not desappointed. It's the perfect combination of softness and firmness. I sleep incredibly well and I wake up in the mornings with no body pains! That's a dream come true! I definitely recommend it to anyone who needs a firm but soft mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Alina T.

customer_reviews.title: Bye, Bye Backache!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a twin mattress for my daybed. It came quickly and it was easy to open. I let it rest for 48 hours as recommended, and so far I’m impressed with how comfortable it is. I can’t remember waking up without a backache since sleeping on it!
customer_reviews.author: Pixlee

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress very pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this mattress so far had a nice comfortable feel. I purchased it for my sons uprgrade from a toddler bed to a twin bed. He seems to like it and is sleeping better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S

customer_reviews.title: firm + comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: mattress inflated quickly and is really comfortable. it feels like memory foam at the top but doesn't try absorb you into the mattress. also looks great - the blue is really pretty. i like a firmer mattress and this is perfect! only thing is it is 9-9.5 inches not 10
customer_reviews.author: ny

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps hot
customer_reviews.text: Wake up with a backache every morning, before sleeps hot
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but more firm than expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice mattress. Looks descent. Unboxing was easy (my mattress didn't explode!) It says "medium", but I feel that it is leaning towards the fim side of the spectrum. It didn't smell (my sense of smell is not strong).
customer_reviews.author: Reza

customer_reviews.title: mattress quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 mattresses for my children. These were good quality items. I was not ready for the inflation of the first mattress so it didn't shape as well as the second. The kids seem to sleep well and feel no pocking spring. I know this is a great price in comparison to some mattress stores. Delivery was included.
customer_reviews.author: T walk

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, but totally different with first one I bought two years ago. When I opened it 4 days ago, it won’t pump up totally, so right now the 4 sides of bed are sloppy. Can you replace it or refund or tell me what should I do????
customer_reviews.author: Lily Yao

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a new mattress so I did some research online for a few days trying to find the best one. I went with this mattress because of the reviews, it being coil and latex. I wanted something safe for her and it needed to be able to last. So far it is just right for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: plush mattress
customer_reviews.text: I Easy set up clean lines nice plush euro top. great mattress for the money comfy Would buy again for guest room
customer_reviews.author: C.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Twin bed one of the best bed I wish I didn’t spend on my last mattress so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Sumeer

customer_reviews.title: High quality with affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Bed arrived on time, was easy to handle and set-up and sleeps really good.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan Key

customer_reviews.title: Superhard bed
customer_reviews.text: My back just doesn't feel like I got rest on this bed
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3! One for each of my kids! They are getting a full night's rest!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable mattress. I bought it for my son and he really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bed
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft and comfortable. So glad we picked this bed for our daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my Purchase of this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for a secondary bed we use and it is working out well. Firm core for great back support and soft topper for comfort. Used it with our existing Box spring and was easy an easy switch! Delivered as promised and packaging made it easy to carry and set up. I am happy with my purchase of the Bedstory 10 inch Natural Latex Hybrid mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Phil MHC

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: We live full time in our RV and sleep on it every night. Good rest.
customer_reviews.author: TC Rider

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son sleeps so better! He loves going to bed because of how comfy it is. It has made a world of difference for his sleep and how easy it is to put him to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Westall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying a mattress on amazon but I’m happy I took a chance on this one. I used to wake up with a slight pain in my back but not anymore. Not only is it very comfortable but it came very fast and nicely packaged. I’d definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tim De Haro

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress really helped relieve my usual morning back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J. Byrnes

product_meta.title: BedStory Queen Mattress, 10Inch Latex Infused Memory Foam and Pocket Spring Mattress, Relieve Stress& Deepen Sleep, Bed Mattress in Small Box, Medium Firm Mattresses
feature_bullets: 【Imported Natural Latex】: Imported latex has the characteristics of high resilience, breathability and dehumidification, avoid being hot and sweating. Soft and more fit to the body curve, relieve physical stress and deepen sleep. And the latex layer also keeps mattress clean inside.

【Hybrid Spring Mattress for Better Sleep】: Soft memory foam provides conforming comfort and relief back pain. The wrapped-coil spring is to enhance the support of the mattress. This Hybrid Design reaches a balance between firmness and softness, designed for all sleepers for a better night sleep.

【CertiPUR-US Certified Mattresses】: All Foams we use are CertiPUR-US Certified, eco-friendly and durable. BedStory mattress also meets CFR1633 Standard which means itself is hard to burn, therefore very safe to use.

【Silent Sleep】: All wrapped-coil inside the bed mattress move independently due to the unique Independent Encased Coil Structure, this helps reducing the sensation of movement which means your partner won't be woken up when you move on the bed.

【Attention und Warranty】：The Queen Mattress（60" W x 80" L x 10''H） is compressed, rolled and vacuum sealed in a box for easy delivery . It usually take 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand. We offer 10 years warranty and lifetime after-sale service and 30 days Trial. Welcome to inquire if there’s any question.
